official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands and facilities in Whitfield County, Georgia, to the University of Georgia.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Cohutta Fish Hatchery in Whitefield County, Georgia, to the University of Georgia.
